name: 帕特里夏·希区柯克 Patricia Hitchcock
intro: Patricia Alma Hitchcock O'Connell (born July 7, 1928), also known as Pat Hitchcock, is an English actress and producer. She is the only child of English director Alfred Hitchcock and Alma Reville, and had small roles in several of his films, starting with Stage Fright (1950).
